statements: SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, order_date FROM OrderHistory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM OrderHistory ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, quantity, customer_id FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_id > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, customer_id FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 5 OR customer_id = 10 ORDER BY order_id
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM OrderHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY order_count DESC
SELECT * FROM OrderHistory WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31'
SELECT * FROM order_history;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id FROM order_history;
SELECT order_date, order_quantity FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT product_id, supplier_id, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE quantity_supplied > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT product_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_history GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM supply_chain GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' AND delivery_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_supplied FROM order_history JOIN supply_chain ON order_history.product_id = supply_chain.product_id;
SELECT * FROM order_history;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM order_history WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, demand_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supply_id, supply_date, product_id FROM supply_chain ORDER BY supply_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT demand_date, demand_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 200 ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT SUM(supply_quantity) AS total_supply FROM supply_chain WHERE product_id = 300 GROUP BY supply_date;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, supply_quantity FROM order_history JOIN supply_chain ON order_history.product_id = supply_chain.product_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, d.demand_quantity FROM order_history o JOIN demand_forecast d ON o.product_id = d.product_id WHERE o.quantity >= d.demand_quantity ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, SUM(total_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM orders GROUP BY order_id, customer_id, order_date;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 2000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, shipment_id, carrier, tracking_number FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id;
